title: Help identifying 1930 or 1940 fonts in picture
content:
Need help identifying fonts in old photo. Wanting to do a t-shirt with the fonts.  
Any help is appreciated.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [GrandpaFont.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019011836/http:/typophile.com/files/Grandpa-Wright_Font.jpg) | 18.25 KB |
author: dkstahl7112

comments.content: It's hand lettering, not type. Check out House Industries for some similar looking fonts.
Have a go at doing the designing and drawing yourself.

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019011836im_/http:/typophile.com/files/435_435_brilliant_air_1__4175.gif)

What are the name of fonts in this logo, please help if you know
You could also learn the finer art of sign painting. Good luck. You might also consider Letterheads Fonts if you don't mind revival fonts.
